title: Set $$f(x)=0$$
text: To find the x-intercept, let $$f(x)=0$$ and and solve for $$x$$.

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: Solve for $$f(x)=x^2+5x+6=0$$. We can factor it as $$\left(x+3\right) \left(x+2\right)$$.
speech: Solve for  f of x is equal to, x squared plus 5 x plus 6 is equal to 0 . We can factor it as  parentheses x plus 3,  times, parentheses x plus 2,  .

title: Solve For The Parabola
text: $$\left(x+3\right) \left(x+2\right)=0$$\nUse zero product property, we know $$x+3=0$$ or $$x+2=0$$ which gives the answer $$x=-3$$ or $$x=-2$$.
speech: parentheses x plus 3,  times, parentheses x plus 2,  is equal to, 0 \nUse zero product property, we know  x, plus 3, is equal to, 0  or  x, plus 2, is equal to 0  which gives the answer  x, is equal to, negative 3  or  x, is equal to negative 2 .

title: Put The Answer Into (x,y)
text: We know that $$y=0$$ in x-intercepts and we get $$x=-3$$, $$-2$$ through the calculations above. Put together, we get two x-intercepts-- $$(-3,0)$$ and $$(-2,0)$$.
